channel.title: Comments on: Vegan Cookies and Cream Milkshake (AIP, Paleo)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/vegan-cookies-and-cream-milkshake-aip-paleo/#comment-587">Laurie</a>.
Hi Laurie, so happy to hear you enjoyed the milkshake! I also love simple and easy recipes that don't require much time in the kitchen. Appreciate you taking the time to share!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Laurie.

Hi Laurie, so happy to hear you enjoyed the milkshake! I also love simple and easy recipes that don’t require much time in the kitchen. Appreciate you taking the time to share!

item.title: By: Laurie
item.dc:creator: Laurie
item.description: This was really delicious and just what I needed! I’m not creative at all in the kitchen so I love these simple recipes. I did add protein powder as I can tolerate it. The shake was very thick and very banana-y tasting. This will be a great summer treat!
item.content:encoded: This was really delicious and just what I needed! I’m not creative at all in the kitchen so I love these simple recipes. I did add protein powder as I can tolerate it. The shake was very thick and very banana-y tasting. This will be a great summer treat!
